25812bf456959aa5f28dc570f341a3ba (10:49): is 'WHATWG: http://www.whatwg.org/ -- logs: http://krijnhoetmer.nl/irc-logs/ -- stats: http://gavinsharp.com/irc/whatwg.html -- Please leave your sense of logic at the door, thanks!'

b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (10:51): 69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e: speaking of work licensing, on surface, it seems to me that the work licensing vocab is something you might want to use in addition to another vocab
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (10:51): how do you do that with Microdata
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (10:51): (the other vocabs saying something non-copyright-related about the same images or something)
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (10:52): just have two items
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (10:57): 69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e: can you have two overlapping items so that the <img> belongs to both?
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (10:58): there are ways, but not ways i would recommend
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (11:14): 69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e: isn't that a bug then? or YAGNI?
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (11:15): b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9: none of the use cases that people brought up needed it
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (11:16): b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9: if there are concrete use cases that need it, maybe we can revisit that
949258fe0c21b4643bcc81491c088988 (11:23): so, how is microphone audio upload doing?
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (11:28): 949258fe0c21b4643bcc81491c088988: you mean <input type=file accept=audio/*> ?
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (11:28): 949258fe0c21b4643bcc81491c088988: or streaming microphone upload?
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (11:28): well they're both in the spec and slowly getting implemented
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (11:29): dunno about specifics
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (11:29): try it :-)
949258fe0c21b4643bcc81491c088988 (11:30): is there a version of the spec with the annotations saying which parts have been implemented?
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (11:30): whatwg.org/C
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (11:30): but not everything is annotated correctly
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (11:31): 69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e, btw, I'm in favor of going back to one spec
949258fe0c21b4643bcc81491c088988 (11:31): http://www.whatwg.org/specs/web-apps/current-work/multipage/number-state.html#file-upload-state has annotations dated 2009
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (11:31): edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e: yeah, i might do that and set up redirects and stuff
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (11:31): edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e: trying to catch up a bit on feedback first
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (11:32): 69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e, also, how easy would it be to host other specs on whatwg.org/specs/ ?
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (11:32): 69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e, like DOM Range and such
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (11:33): 69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e, and maybe even DOM Core / XHR for better copyright conditions
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (11:33): should be possible to figure something out
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (11:33): either in .../specs/ or on separate subdomains
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (11:33): (subdomains are easier to set up, but subdirectories should be possible too)
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (11:33): not right now though, it's way past my bed time
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (11:34): catch me online tomorrow and let's figure something out
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (11:35): no rush
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (11:35): and good night
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (11:35): nn
